name: Responsive Popup for YouTube & Vimeo
author: Velmurugan Kuberan

sections.description:
This plugin generates a hyperlink through the shortcode. When that link is clicked, the given video (depends upon configuration) will be displayed in a responsive popup dialog box.

How to use it
Examples:

Youtube
[vk-videopopup src=”youtube” id=”EqPtz5qN7HM” text=”Play hotel California”]

Vimeo
[vk-videopopup src=”vimeo” id=”187625966″ text=”Click to Play Pharrell williams happy”]

text attribute is not mandatory and other two attributes must be specified otherwise popup will not work.

for the source (src): you have only 2 properties: Youtube or Vimeo

for id: you should get the video id from Youtube or Vimeo

See the Demo on https://tech2vel.com/
sections.installation:
1. Use WordPress’ plugin interface to find and install the plugin & activate it.
  2. Add shortcode to your post or page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Use WordPress’ plugin interface to find and install the plugin & activate it.
  2. Add shortcode to your post or page.
